name: data-consultancy
description: Site pessoal para prospect de novos clientes para consultoria em dados

scripts.start: concurrently "python manage.py runserver" "npx sass --watch myapp/static/scss:myapp/static/css" "npx tsc --watch" "npm run browser-sync" "npm run open"
scripts.browser-sync: browser-sync start --proxy localhost:8000 --files 'myapp/templates/**/*.html, myapp/static/css/**/*.css, myapp/static/js/**/*.js' --no-notify --no-open --ui false
